text: Kotka (literally eagle) is a town in Kymenlaakso, Finland. It is part of the Kymenlaakso region in southern Finland. The centre of Kotka is located at Kotkansaari island. The most famous sport team from Kotka is KTP (Kotkan Työväen Palloilijat). The KTP-team plays football and basketball. == Gallery == File: Kotkansaari1.jpg|View of Kotkansaari File: Kotkan kirkko talvella.jpg|Church in Kotka File: Kotka maretarium.jpg|Maretarium - Finnish Sea Life File: Sea museum Vellamo.JPG|Sea Museum Vellamo File: MarianKatu_Street_in_Kotka.JPG|Mariankatu street in Kotka File: Kotka_19_August_2009_Sunset.JPG|Sunset in Kotka - 19.August.2009, 21:34, hotel Sokos ==Sister cities== * Gdynia, Poland * Tallinn, Estonia * Kronstadt, Russia * Saint Petersburg, Russia ==Sources== ==Other websites== *City of Kotka – Official website *Map of Kotka * Category:Towns in Finland Category:Municipalities of Kymenlaakso Category:1879 establishments in Europe Category:1870s establishments in Finland
